members.joinCircumstances: Officially joined after Arlong Park arc

keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Defeat Nelson's Marines
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates successfully defeat Commodore Nelson Royal's Marine fleet, with Luffy destroying the flagship and the crew protecting Apis and Ryu.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's growing strength and their willingness to fight against corrupt Marines to protect innocent people and creatures. Shows them as a cohesive fighting unit.

keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Witness Lost Island's Emergence
keyMoments.description: The entire crew witnesses the legendary Lost Island resurface from the ocean, fulfilling Ryu's dream and completing their mission.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the successful completion of their promise to help Apis and Ryu. The crew experiences a miraculous moment that reinforces the wonder and mystery of their world.

ships.description: The Straw Hats' caravel ship gifted by Kaya

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
